meanings.definition: A person who bowls in the game of tenpins.
meanings.sent1: The tenpinners cheered when they knocked down all the pins.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends included skilled tenpinners who enjoyed bowling together.
meanings.sent3: The tenpinners joked about their funny bowling shoes before starting the game.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bowling, tenpinners are the stars who aim for strikes.
meanings.sent5: The tenpinners' competitive spirit made the game exciting for everyone.

meanings.definition: A bowling ball used in the game of tenpins.
meanings.sent1: The heavy tenpinners rolled down the alley with precision.
meanings.sent2: The shiny tenpinners gleamed under the bowling alley lights.
meanings.sent3: The tenpinners were carefully selected for the championship match.
meanings.sent4: The tenpinners' smooth surface glided effortlessly towards the pins.
meanings.sent5: The tenpinners' weight determined their speed and impact on the pins.

meanings.definition: The act of bowling in the game of tenpins.
meanings.sent1: The sound of the tenpinners hitting the pins echoed through the bowling alley.
meanings.sent2: Players practiced their tenpinners technique to improve their game.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected spin on the tenpinners surprised everyone in the tournament.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic motion of the tenpinners symbolized the players' focus and skill.
meanings.sent5: The smooth release of the tenpinners led to a perfect strike.
